mapper.update:
update payv2_buss_company
channel_id=#{channelId},
user_name=#{userName},
pass_word=#{passWord},
pay_pass_word=#{payPassWord},
company_key=#{companyKey},
company_secret=#{companySecret},
company_name=#{companyName},
company_photo=#{companyPhoto},
company_scale=#{companyScale},
company_type=#{companyType},
company_trade=#{companyTrade},
company_trade_var=#{companyTradeVar},
company_range_province=#{companyRangeProvince},
company_range_city=#{companyRangeCity},
company_addr=#{companyAddr},
license_num=#{licenseNum},
license_addr=#{licenseAddr},
license_pic=#{licensePic},
organization_code=#{organizationCode},
organization_code_url=#{organizationCodeUrl},
other_information=#{otherInformation},
legal_name=#{legalName},
legal_id_card=#{legalIdCard},
account_type=#{accountType},
account_bank=#{accountBank},
account_name=#{accountName},
account_card=#{accountCard},
way_arrival_type=#{wayArrivalType},
way_arrival_value=#{wayArrivalValue},
wechat_account_card=#{wechatAccountCard},
alipay_account_card=#{alipayAccountCard},
license_type=#{licenseType},
contacts_name=#{contactsName},
contacts_phone=#{contactsPhone},
contacts_mail=#{contactsMail},
company_status=#{companyStatus},
company_pass_reason=#{companyPassReason},
is_random=#{isRandom},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from payv2_buss_company where user_name = #{userName}

select id,channel_id,user_name,pass_word,company_key,company_secret,company_name,company_scale,company_type,company_trade,company_range_province,company_range_city,license_num,license_addr,license_pic,organization_code,organization_code_url,legal_name,legal_id_card,account_type,account_bank,account_name,account_card,license_type,contacts_name,contacts_phone,contacts_mail,company_status,company_pass_reason,is_delete,create_time,update_time from payv2_buss_company where user_name = #{userName} and pass_word = #{password}
